title.@value: Disorders of newborn related to long gestation or high birth weight

definition.@value: Usually implies gestation > 290 or 294 days (42 weeks); high birthweight = >4000g.

codingNote.@value: When both birth weight and gestational age are available, priority of assignment should be given to birth weight.

label.@value: Disorders of newborn related to long gestation or high birth weight
